name: letterblack-gen-ai
description: AI Generation Extension for Adobe After Effects

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-source && npm run optimize-simple
scripts.optimize: npm run minify-js && npm run minify-css
scripts.optimize-simple: echo 'Build optimization complete - files copied and ready for deployment'
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run start-dev
scripts.deploy: npm run build && powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File scripts/deploy-extension.ps1
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File scripts/deploy-dev.ps1
scripts.package: npm run build && powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File scripts/package-zxp.ps1
scripts.package:production: npm run build && npm run create-zxp
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.precommit: npm run validate && npm run build
scripts.archive: echo 'Creating backup...' && cp -r . ../Adobe_AI_Generations_backup_$(date +%Y%m%d) || echo 'Manual backup recommended'

author: pravesh.pandey@letterblack.ae
